title: Pokémon - Ancient Roar - SV4K - Booster Display (JP)
Pokémon - Future Flash - SV4M - Booster Display [JP]
Magic: The Gathering - Murders at Karlov Manor - Play Booster Box
body_html: A series of shocking murders involving some of Ravnica’s most powerful citizens has the city on the verge of chaos. Now detectives are on the case . . . and you’re one of them. Return to the fan-favorite plane of Ravnica in Murders at Karlov Manor, Magic’s unique take on the murder mystery genre. This Murders at Karlov Manor Play Booster Box contains 36 Play Boosters, perfect for both Limited play and opening packs just for fun. Each Play Booster contains 14 Magic: The Gathering cards and 1 Token/Ad card, Suspect Punchout card, or Art Card. (Regular Art Card found in 30% of packs. Foil-stamped Signature Art Card in 5%.) Every pack includes a combination of 1–4 cards of rarity Rare or higher and 3–6 Uncommon, 6–9 Common, and 1 Land cards (Full-Art Land in 33% of packs). One card of any rarity is Traditional Foil. The Land card is also Traditional Foil in 20% of boosters, and a special bonus card from Magic’s history can be found in 12% of boosters. Rulebook not included.

title: Murders at Karlov Manor - Commander Deck Set (EN)
body_html: This bundle includes all 4 Murders at Karlov Manor Commander Decks—Deadly Disguise, Revenant Recon, Deep Clue Sea, and Blame Game. Each deck set includes 1 ready-to-play deck of 100 Magic cards (2 Traditional Foil Legendary cards, 98 nonfoil cards), a 2-card Collector Booster Sample Pack (contains 1 Traditional Foil or Nonfoil alt-border card of rarity Rare or higher and 1 Traditional Foil Borderless Common or Uncommon card), 1 foil-etched Display Commander (a thick cardstock copy of the commander card with foil etched into the card’s border and art), 10 double-sided tokens, 1 deck box (can hold 100 sleeved cards), 1 Life Wheel, 1 strategy insert, and 1 reference card.

title: Murders at Karlov Manor - Collector Booster Box (EN)
body_html: A high-profile case slides across your desk. It’s your job to catch the city’s most notorious cards. Thankfully, an experienced gumshoe like you knows exactly where to look: Collector Boosters. In this lineup, you’ll find Collector Booster-exclusive special treatments and 10–12 Traditional Foil cards in every pack. This Murders at Karlov Manor Collector Booster Box contains 12 Murders at Karlov Manor Collector Boosters. Each Collector Booster contains 15 Magic: The Gathering cards and 1 Traditional Foil double-sided token, with a combination of 5 cards of rarity Rare or higher, 3–5 Uncommon, 4–6 Common, and 1 Full-Art Land cards. Serialized Card in <1% of boosters.

title: Pokémon 151 - SV3.5 - Alakazam Ex Collection
body_html:
Alakazam ex plays mind tricks on your opponent by attacking from the Bench!

After evolving from Abra and Kadabra, this formidable Pokémon ex shows off its Psychic-type prowess no matter where it stands on the battlefield.

title: Pokémon 151 -  SV3.5 - Zapdos Ex Collection
body_html: Strike with electrifying power and then retreat as fast as lightning with Zapdos ex! This Legendary Pokémon of the Kanto region is here as a ready-to-play promo card and an oversize card for your collection, along with a foil card featuring Electabuzz, and more Pokémon inside booster packs from the special Scarlet & Violet—151 expansion.

title: Pokémon 151 -  SV3.5 - Binder Collection (EN)
body_html:
Just like a Pokédex, a binder makes it easy to keep track of your Pokémon collection! With this 9-pocket binder, you can show off up to 360 of your favorite Pokémon TCG cards. Get a head start filling it up with 4 booster packs from the special Scarlet & Violet—151 expansion!

The Pokémon TCG: Scarlet & Violet—151 Binder Collection includes:

A binder with 20 9-pocket pages
4 Pokémon TCG: Scarlet & Violet—151 booster packs

title: Post-Pack Signature
PSA Grading Ticket - Card Regular
body_html:
1 card submission to PSA on REGULAR service.

Dispatch always in the 1st week of the month. Your cards have to arrive until the last day of the month to guarantee to be dispatched with the next submission. Otherwise they will be dispatched one month later.

While purchasing this service, please ensure you follow the submission guidelines.

title: PSA Grading Ticket - Value Bulk
body_html:
1 card submission to PSA on VALUE-BULK service.

Dispatch always in the 1st week of the month. Your cards have to arrive until the last day of the month to guarantee to be dispatched with the next submission. Otherwise they will be dispatched one month later.

While purchasing this service, please ensure you follow the submission guidelines.

title: PSA Grading Ticket - Card Bulk
body_html:
1 card submission to PSA on BULK service.

ONLY TCG CARDS BETWEEN 1980-2023.

Dispatch always in the 1st week of the month. Your cards have to arrive until the last day of the month to guarantee to be dispatched with the next submission. Otherwise they will be dispatched one month later.

While purchasing this service, please ensure you follow the submission guidelines.

title: Zenkai Series EX Set 07 - Collector’s Booster Box B24-C (EN)
body_html:
Must items for competitive players who want to build decks with the highest rarity!

All Z07 cards are available in its shiny version!
A gorgeous lineup of high rarity cards and limited illustration cards!

May Include a SCR alt art or a limited illustration card (special holo alt art)!

DOUBLE SIDED HOLO LEADER AS A BOX TOPPER!

One double sided holo version of one of the nine different leaders from the Z07 will be randomly included ! Introduced for the first time in the last Collector's Booster and so well received, we are introducing it again this time! Don't miss out on the limited leader cards!

AT LEAST ONE SR RARITY CARD IS GUARANTEED!

One of the SR, SPR, OR SCR CARD is included in the pack!

ALT ART VERSIONS OF ALL 3 SCRS INCLUDED!

Contains three SCRs from Z07 with different illustrations!
These special illustrations exclusively available on this product will surely excite collectors even more!

EXCLUSIVE TO COLLECTOR'S BOOSTER “SUPER LOW PULL RATE” CARD IS NOW AVAILABLE IN NEW DESIGN

Instead of the original holo cards that first appeared in the previous set, this set features a special collector s booster limited card with a new desig n ! Don't miss out this chance to get the legendary card that will forever remain in the history of DBSCG!

Rarity

Contents:
Common (silver foil ver.) x60
Uncommon (silver foil ver.) x30
Rare (silver foil ver.) x29
Super Rare x18
Special Rare x14
Secret Rare x3
Special Leader Rare x9
Exclusive Illustration (silver foil ver.) × 36
Exclusive Illustration (holo ver.) × 33
Exclusive Illustration SCR (holo ver.) x3
Exclusive illustration (new holo ver.) × 1
*236 types total

Configuration

x1 Booster Pack = x12 cards
x1 Display = x12 packs

title: Premium Card Collection - Live Action Edition (EN)
body_html:
A collection of cards frequently used in player’s decks is being released as a Premium Card Collection! Enjoy the ONE PIECE CARD GAME even more by using these cards with new illustrations!
*The cards in this product are different versions of previously released cards featuring alternate illustrations.

-Card booklet: 1 booklet

title: ST09 Yamato Starter Deck
body_html:
Simultaneous Release of Two Popular Characters!

Two decks featuring the internationally popular characters Monkey.D.Luffy and Yamato will be released at the same time! Whether you’re new to ONE PIECE CARD GAME or already building up your card collection, this is the character lineup you’ve been waiting for!

It’s Not Too Late! Great Deck for New & Experienced Players!

Add to your card pool with black cards, first released in ST-05, and yellow cards, first released in ST-07!
Have more scope for deckbuilding with enough black or yellow cards to rival the other colors!
This is the perfect way for new players to get started, and a great chance for experienced players to strengthen their deck!

 

Each deck contains the following:

  • Constructed Deck ×1 (51 cards)
  • DON! Card x10
  • Play Sheet x1

title: ST12 - Zoro & Sanji Starter Deck (EN)
body_html:
This deck is made up entirely of new cards and centers on two beloved characters, Zoro and Sanji! It also features many popular and minor characters familiar to the
two pirates!

Introducing a new green blue Leader card, “ Zoro x Sanji”! As the first hybrid Leader, this card opens the scope for new approaches to gameplay!

The green and blue cards featured in this pack have perfect synergy with the booster pack released in the same month! Combine both packs to broaden the
range of available strategies!

Contents

・Constructed Deck x1 (51 cards)
・DON!! Cards x10
・Playsheet x1

title: ST11 - Uta Starter Deck (EN)
body_html:
-A new starter deck starring Uta is certain to attract a wide range of consumers, including women and youth!
-Includes multiple event cards based on songs from ONE PIECE FILM RED!
-Leader Uta and the Event cards can be used to complement the FILM-type cards in OP-02.

Constructed Deck ×1   (51 cards)
DON!! Card x10
Playsheet x1

title: Pokémon 151 -  SV3.5 - Ultra Premium Collection
body_html:
Discover the fascinating world of Pokémon that awaits you in the legendary Kanto region - a world full of wonder, adventure and mystery! In the vast and mysterious landscapes, eyewitnesses have reported something extraordinary - an encounter with the legendary Pokémon Mew.

The Ultra Premium Collection Scarlet & Violet - 151 of the Pokémon Trading Card Game contains:

16 booster packs of the Pokémon Trading Card Game expansion Scarlet & Violet - 151
1 Hyper Rare metal card with Mew ex
1 Special Illustration Rare promo card with Mew ex
1 Illustration Rare promo card with Mewtwo
1 play mat with Mew in embroidered edge design
1 game box
1 coin with Mew
Various accessories for the Pokémon Trading Card Game
